parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "course_concept": "{{ $json['Course Concept'] }}",
  "audience_type": "{{ $json['Audience Type'] }}",
  "source_urls": "{{ $json['Source URLs'] || '' }}",
  "voice_type": "{{ $json['Voice Selection'] || 'Charon' }}",
  "research_foundation": "Available - comprehensive evidence base will be generated"
}

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "success": true,
  "message": "Course generated successfully!",
  "course_concept": "{{ $node['Complete Course Generation'].json.course.course_concept }}",
  "modules_generated": {{ $node['Complete Course Generation'].json.modules_ready_for_audio }},
  "knowledge_id": {{ $node['Complete Course Generation'].json.knowledge_id }},
  "course_architecture": {{ $node['Complete Course Generation'].json.course.course_architecture }},
  "audio_ready": {{ $node['Complete Course Generation'].json.audio_generation_ready }},
  "next_step": "Course complete and ready for audio generation"
}
